synopsis.text: France-returned Mao Mizusawa steps back into Kouichi Sanada and Kazuki Aihara's lives, bringing with her a whirlwind of high school drama and budding romance. After years of living abroad, Mao's temporary stay at Kouichi's place, thanks to his mother's generosity, leads to a complex web of emotions and relationships. Kouichi, who once considered Mao as a little sister, now finds himself grappling with newfound feelings for her, all while trying to navigate his existing crush on Yumi Hoshino. As the trio maneuvers through the trials and tribulations of high school, they find solace and support in each other, creating a heartwarming tale of friendship, love, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
